pages.text: It seems those $(l:resources/stargazing)流星$(/l) have more secrets than you previously thought, and weird ones at that.$(br)Baked Stardust tastes oddly refreshing, the magic makes your tongue tingle as the heaven-sent candy dissolves in your mouth. You felt an odd lot healthier afterwards.$(br)Their hard, golden flesh has some purple speckles, shimmering like star shards.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Perhaps the speckles are the source of their restorative properties? 你想要试试做一个紫色的。

pages.title: 一种罕见宝物
pages.text: Now THAT's a tasty one!$(br)Even just touching those star-laden streaks gives you much the same tingle as when you ate the whole thing.
